Class StationHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • station.StationSystem
      • station.StationHelper
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Helper
    public class StationHelper
extends StationSystem
implements Helper
    The Class StationHelper.
    Author:
    Pham Huu Tho This class will give you the information of which station follows this class's rule and the respective distance and fee counted by that rule.
